https://vizdom.dev

> Build, Update, and Visualize Diagrams using Code.

The [live editor](https://vizdom.dev/editor/view) is a really nice way to work with graphviz, and you can use it without an account.

[Here's](https://vizdom.dev/editor/view?--_QACCwABPwECCwAQcvMDAgsAEHDnAAILAAEQAhJ0HwQAIQACCwABCAECCwABygICCwABSwQCCwABkAMCCwABZQIRdNwAAWMAEXaPAAGiARFwuAEBNAECCwAQbWgCEWz9AAHcAAILABBmeQARcX4CARMBsHF6IC0-IGdjCn0K) an example of a reasonably complicated graph that I made during this year's [[2023 problem log|Advent of Code]]
